thread.section_title: Link Interactive Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Link Interactive | linkinteractive.com
thread.title: Christina Cascante Key
thread.title_full: Link Interactive reviewed by Christina Cascante Key

author: Christina Cascante Key
title: Christina Cascante Key
text: I wish all companies provided the value of customer service we received from Link Interactive's Andrea Tech. She very patiently answered all of our questions, promptly followed up with us without making us wait, and always seemed to have our best interest in mind. The many positive online reviews for Link Interactive are definitely right on!
